description.en: The most complete and well organized online reader where you can find stories and mangás in portuguese language.
description.pt_BR: Mais completo e organizado leitor de histórias e Mangás Livre Online em português.
description.ga_IE: An léitheoir ar líne is iomláine agus dea-eagraithe nuair is féidir leat scéalta agus mangás a aimsiú i dteanga na Portaingéile.
